com.helger.schematron.svrl

Class SVRLResourceError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helger.commons.error.ResourceError
      • com.helger.schematron.svrl.SVRLResourceError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.helger.commons.error.IHasErrorLevel, com.helger.commons.error.IResourceError, com.helger.commons.error.ISeverityComparable<com.helger.commons.error.IResourceError>, com.helger.commons.name.IHasDisplayText, com.helger.commons.state.IErrorIndicator, com.helger.commons.state.ISuccessIndicator, Serializable

    public class SVRLResourceError
extends com.helger.commons.error.ResourceError
    Special SVRL resource error that contains the Schematron "test" as well.
    Author:
    PEPPOL.AT, BRZ, Philip Helger
    See Also:

        Parameters:
        aLocation - Location where the error occurred. May not be null.
        eErrorLevel - The error level. May not be null.
        sErrorText - The error text. May not be null.
        sTest - The SVRL test that triggered this error. May not be null.
